      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Called to initialize a controller after its root element has been completely processed. * Shows the full parts and product lists.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - location - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known. *Java8 docs*
      resourceBundle - resources - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized. *Java8 docs*

    • isValidPassword

      public boolean isValidPassword(String username, String password) throws SQLException
      Validates if username and password is correct
      Parameters:
      username - accepts users username
      password - accepts users password
      Returns:
      true if the password matches the username entered false if the password doesn't match a username entered
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database has issues

    • checkUpcomingAppointment

      public void checkUpcomingAppointment(String user)
      Checks if there are any appointments for current users within 15 minutes
      Parameters:
      user - accepts the user that has logged in Gets a list of appointments based on the user that has logged in and filters it to see if that user has any appointments within 15 minutes of now. Sends an alert to the UI if there is an appointment and also if there isn't one. LAMBDA EXPRESSION -- used while filtering the filtered list of user appointments for more efficient code. Sets the predicate on the filtered list to filter appointments from the appointment users appointment list based on the datetime being 15 minutes after the current

    • getUserAppointmentList

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getUserAppointmentList(String user)
      Gets List of Appointments based on the User
      Parameters:
      user - takes in the user that has logged in successfully
      Returns:
      a list of the appointments of the user that has logged in. throws SQLException for database issues
